member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.JournalEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for Elite Dangerous journal events.

summary.para: Type of journal entry that triggered event.
Will be a class from the Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal namespace derived from JournalBase, or JournalBase itself in the case of an unhandled journal event type.
Elite Dangerous journal event, deserialized into a .NET object of the type specified by JournalEventArgs.journalType.

Unhandled json values within a journal entry type will be contained in member property:
Dictionary<string, object> AdditionalProperties.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs
member.summary: Provides values used as arguments for Observatory notification events.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs.Title
member.summary: Text typically displayed as header content.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs.TitleSsml
member.summary:
SSML representation of Title text.
This value is optional, if omitted the value of NotificationArgs.Title will be used for voice synthesis without markup.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs.Detail
member.summary: Text typically displayed as body content.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs.DetailSsml
member.summary:
SSML representation of Detail text.
This value is optional, if omitted the value of NotificationArgs.Detail will be used for voice synthesis without markup.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs.Timeout
member.summary: Specify window timeout in ms (overrides Core setting). Specify 0 timeout to persist until removed via IObservatoryCore.CancelNotification. Default -1 (use Core setting).

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs.XPos
member.summary: Specify window X position as a percentage from upper left corner (overrides Core setting). Default -1.0 (use Core setting).

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs.YPos
member.summary: Specify window Y position as a percentage from upper left corner (overrides Core setting). Default -1.0 (use Core setting).

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs.Rendering
member.summary: Specifies the desired renderings of the notification. Defaults to .

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs.Suppression
member.summary: Specifies if some part of the notification should be suppressed. Not supported by all notifiers. Defaults to .

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.NotificationSuppression
member.summary: Defines constants for suppression of title or detail announcement in a notification.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationSuppression.None
member.summary: No suppression.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationSuppression.Title
member.summary: Suppress title.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationSuppression.Detail
member.summary: Suppress detail.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.NotificationRendering
member.summary: Defines constants for controlling notification routing to plugins or native notification handlers.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationRendering.NativeVisual
member.summary: Send notification to native visual popup notificaiton handler.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationRendering.NativeVocal
member.summary: Send notification to native speech notification handler.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationRendering.PluginNotifier
member.summary: Send notification to all installed notifier plugins.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.NotificationRendering.All
member.summary: Send notification to all available handlers.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorState
member.summary: Flags indicating current state of journal monitoring.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorState.Idle
member.summary: Monitoring is stopped.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorState.Realtime
member.summary: Real-time monitoring is active.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorState.Batch
member.summary: Batch read of historical journals is in progress.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorState.PreRead
member.summary: Batch read of recent journals is in progress to establish current player state.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorStateChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information about a LogMonitor state transition.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorStateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState
member.summary: The previous LogMonitor state.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorStateChangedEventArgs.NewState
member.summary: The new, current LogMonitor state.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorStateChangedEventArgs.IsBatchRead(Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorState)
member.summary: Determins if the given state is a batch read of any form.
member.param: The state to evaluate
member.returns: A boolean; True iff the state provided represents a batch-mode read.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.PluginException
member.summary: Container for exceptions within plugins which cannot be gracefully handled in context, but benefit from having a context-specific user message.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.PluginException.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initialze new PluginException with details of the originating plugin and a specific user-facing message for display.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.PluginException.PluginName
member.summary: Name of plugin from which the exception was thrown.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.PluginException.UserMessage
member.summary: Message to be displayed to user.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan
member.summary: Journal "Scan" event generated when directly FSS scanning, from automatic proximity scans, or nav beacon data.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.ScanType
member.summary: Type of scan which generated the event. Possible options include "Detailed", "AutoScan", and "NavBeaconDetail" (non-exhaustive).

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.BodyName
member.summary: Name of scanned body.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Parents
member.summary: List which reflects Frontier's JSON structure for the "Parents" object. Use of Parent property is recommended instead.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Parent
member.summary: "Parents" object rearranged into more intuitive structure for ease of use.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.DistanceFromArrivalLS
member.summary: Body distance from system arrival point in light-seconds.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.TidalLock
member.summary: Indicates if body is tidally locked to another body (parent, child, or binary partner).

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.TerraformState
member.summary: Whether the planet can be or has been terraformed. Options include "Terraformable", "Terraformed", or "" (non-terraformable or naturally earth-like).

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.PlanetClass
member.summary: Class of planet. Consult your preferred source of journal documentation for all possible values.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Atmosphere
member.summary: Descriptive string for body atmosphere, e.g. "hot thick sulfur dioxide atmosphere".

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.AtmosphereType
member.summary: Simple string indicating dominant atmosphere type, e.g. "SulfurDioxide".

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.AtmosphereComposition
member.summary: List containing full breakdown of atmospheric components and their relative percentages.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Volcanism
member.summary: Descriptive string for type of volcanism present, or an empty string for none, e.g. "major silicate vapour geysers volcanism".

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.MassEM
member.summary: Mass of body in multiples of Earth's mass (5.972e24 kg).

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Radius
member.summary: Radius of body in metres.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.SurfaceGravity
member.summary: Surface gravity in m/sÂ².

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.SurfaceTemperature
member.summary: Average surface temperature in Kelvin.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.SurfacePressure
member.summary: Average surface pressure in Pascals.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Landable
member.summary: Whether the body in landable in the player's current version of Elite Dangerous.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Materials
member.summary: List containing full breakdown of prospectable surface materials and their relative percentages.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Composition
member.summary: Overall composition of body, expressed as percentages of ice, rock, and metal.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.RotationPeriod
member.summary: Rotation period of body in seconds.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.AxialTilt
member.summary: Axial tilt of body in radians.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Rings
member.summary: List of all planetary or stellar ring systems around the body.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.ReserveLevel
member.summary:
Description of the minable material abundance.
Possible values inclue "PristineResources", "MajorResources", "CommonResources", "LowResources", and "DepletedResources".

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.StarType
member.summary: Type of star. Consult your preferred source of journal documentation for all possible values.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Subclass
member.summary: Subclass of star. Consult your preferred source of journal documentation for all possible values.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.StellarMass
member.summary: Mass of star in multiples of The Sun's mass (1.989e30 kg).

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.AbsoluteMagnitude
member.summary: Absolute magnitude of star.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Age_MY
member.summary: Age of body in millions of years.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.Luminosity
member.summary: Yerkes luminosity class of star.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.WasDiscovered
member.summary: Whether the body has been previously discovered by a player.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Scan.WasMapped
member.summary: Whether the body has been previously mapped by a player.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre
member.summary: Barycentre orbital properties, automatically recorded when any member of a multiple-body orbital arrangement is first scanned.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre.StarSystem
member.summary: Name of star system containing scanned body.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre.SystemAddress
member.summary: 64-bit unique identifier for the current star system. Also known as the system's "ID64".

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre.BodyID
member.summary: Id number of body within a system.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre.SemiMajorAxis
member.summary:
Orbital semi-major axis in metres.
Distance from the body's centre of gravity to the parent's centre of gravity at the most distant point in the orbit.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre.Eccentricity
member.summary:
Orbital eccentricity.
0: perfectly circular, 0 > x > 1: eccentric, 1: parabolic (escape) trajectory.
(You should not ever see 1 or 0.)

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre.OrbitalInclination
member.summary: Orbital inclination in degrees.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre.Periapsis
member.summary: Argument of periapsis in degrees.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre.OrbitalPeriod
member.summary: Orbital period in seconds.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre.AscendingNode
member.summary: Longitude of the ascending node in degrees.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.ScanBaryCentre.MeanAnomaly
member.summary: Mean anomaly in degrees.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Screenshot
member.summary: Event generated when the player takes a screenshot.

summary.para: Filename of the screenshot taken in the form of "\\ED Pictures\\filename"
"\\ED Pictures\\" corresponds to "%userprofile%\Pictures\Frontier Developments\Elite Dangerous\"

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Screenshot.Width
member.summary: Pixel width of the saved image.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Screenshot.Height
member.summary: Pixel height of the saved image.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Screenshot.System
member.summary: System name of the current system.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Screenshot.Body
member.summary: Body name of the current location.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Screenshot.Latitude
member.summary: Current latitude if applicable.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Screenshot.Longitude
member.summary: Current longitude if applicable.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Screenshot.Altitude
member.summary: Current altitude if applicable.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.Screenshot.Heading
member.summary: Current heading if applicable.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Files.Journal.SellExplorationData.TotalEarnings

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.Files.CargoFile

member.summary: Type of vehicle currently being reported. "Ship" or "SRV".

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.Files.Converters.LegacyFactionConverter`1
member.summary: Faction changed from a simple string to an object with additional state information. If we find a string convert it to an object with null state.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.Files.Converters.MaterialCompositionConverter
member.summary: The format used for materials changed from an object with a key for each material to an array of objects containing "name" and "percent". Need to handle both if we're going to read historical data. This reads the old format into a class reflecting the new structure.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.Files.Converters.MaterialConverter
member.summary: The format used for materials changed from an object with a key for each material to an array of objects containing "name" and "percent". Need to handle both if we're going to read historical data. This reads the old format into a class reflecting the new structure.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.Files.Converters.StarPosConverter
member.summary: Converting the ordered array of coordinates from the journal to a named tuple for clarity.

summary.para: Base plugin interface containing methods common to both notifiers and workers.
Note: Not intended to be implemented on its own and will not define a functional plugin. Use IObservatoryWorker, IObservatoryNotifier, or both, as appropriate.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryPlugin.Load(Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryCore)

summary.para: This method will be called on startup by Observatory Core when a plugin is first loaded.
Passes the Core interface to the plugin.

member.param: Object implementing Observatory Core's main interface. A reference to this object should be maintained by the plugin for communication back to Core.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryPlugin.Name
member.summary: Full name of the plugin. Displayed in the Core settings tab's plugin list.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryPlugin.ShortName
member.summary:
Short name of the plugin. Used as the tab title for the plugin UI.
Can be omitted, in which case the full Name will be used.

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryPlugin.Version
member.summary:
Version string displayed in the Core settings tab's plugin list.
Potentially used for automated version checking. (Not yet implemented)

member.name: P:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryPlugin.PluginUI
member.summary: Reference to plugin UI to display within its tab.

summary.para: Accessors for plugin settings object. Should be initialized with a default state during the plugin constructor.
Saving and loading of settings is handled by Observatory Core, and any previously saved settings will be set after plugin instantiation, but before Load() is called.

A plugin's settings class is expected to consist of properties with public getters and setters. The settings UI will be automatically generated based on each property type.
The [SettingDisplayName(string name)] attribute can be used to specify a display name, otherwise the name of the property will be used.
Private or internal properties and methods are ignored and can be used for backing values or any other purpose.
If a public property is necessary but not required to be user accessible the [SettingIgnore] property will suppress display.
Interface for worker plugins which process journal data to update their UI or send notifications.

Work required on plugin startup â for example object instantiation â can be done in the constructor or Load() method.
Be aware that saved settings will not be available until Load() is called.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryWorker.JournalEvent``1(``0)
member.summary: Method called when new journal data is processed. Most work done by worker plugins will occur here.
member.typeparam: Specific type of journal entry being received.

param.name: journal
param.para: Elite Dangerous journal event, deserialized into a .NET object.

Unhandled json values within a journal entry type will be contained in member property:
Dictionary<string, object> AdditionalProperties.
Unhandled journal event types will be type JournalBase with all values contained in AdditionalProperties.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryWorker.StatusChange(Observatory.Framework.Files.Status)
member.summary:
Method called when status.json content is updated.
Can be omitted for plugins which do not use this data.
member.param: Player status.json content, deserialized into a .NET object.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryWorker.LogMonitorStateChanged(Observatory.Framework.LogMonitorStateChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Called when the LogMonitor changes state. Useful for suppressing output in certain situations such as batch reads (ie. "Read all") or responding to other state transitions.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryWorker.ReadAllStarted
member.summary:
Method called when the user begins "Read All" journal processing, before any journal events are sent.
Used to track if a "Read All" operation is in progress or not to avoid unnecessary processing or notifications.
Can be omitted for plugins which do not require the distinction.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryWorker.ReadAllFinished
member.summary:
Method called when "Read All" journal processing completes.
Used to track if a "Read All" operation is in progress or not to avoid unnecessary processing or notifications.
Can be omitted for plugins which do not require the distinction.

summary.para: Interface for notifier plugins which receive notification events from other plugins for any purpose.

Work required on plugin startup â for example object instantiation â can be done in the constructor or Load() method.
Be aware that saved settings will not be available until Load() is called.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryNotifier.OnNotificationEvent(Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs)
member.summary: Method called when other plugins send notification events to Observatory Core.
member.param: Details of the notification as sent from the originating worker plugin.

member.name: T:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryCore
member.summary: Interface passed by Observatory Core to plugins. Primarily used for sending notifications and UI updates back to Core.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryCore.SendNotification(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Send a notification out to all native notifiers and any plugins implementing IObservatoryNotifier.
member.param: Title text for notification.
Detail/body text for notificaiton.
member.returns: Guid associated with the notification during its lifetime. Used as an argument with CancelNotification and UpdateNotification.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryCore.SendNotification(Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs)
member.summary: Send a notification with arguments out to all native notifiers and any plugins implementing IObservatoryNotifier.
member.param: NotificationArgs object specifying notification content and behaviour.
member.returns: Guid associated with the notification during its lifetime. Used as an argument with CancelNotification and UpdateNotification.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryCore.CancelNotification(System.Guid)
member.summary: Cancel or close an active notification.
member.param: Guid of notification to be cancelled.

member.name: M:Observatory.Framework.Interfaces.IObservatoryCore.UpdateNotification(System.Guid,Observatory.Framework.NotificationArgs)
member.summary: Update an active notification with a new set of NotificationsArgs. Timeout values are reset and begin counting again from zero if specified.
member.param: Guid of notification to be updated.
NotificationArgs object specifying updated notification content and behaviour.

member.name: F:Observatory.Framework.PluginUI.PluginUIType
member.summary: Type of UI used by plugin.

summary.para: UI object used by plugins with UIType.Avalonia.
(Untested/not implemented)
Collection bound to DataGrid used byu plugins with UIType.Basic.

Objects in collection should be of a class defined within the plugin consisting of string properties.
Each object is a single row, and the property names are used as column headers.
